items.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
items.description: Master the core concepts of JavaScript. Learn variables, functions, objects, arrays, and how the JavaScript engine works behind the scenes.

items.title: CSS Layouts & Animations
items.description: Take your CSS skills to the next level. Learn Flexbox, Grid, animations, transitions, and responsive design techniques.

items.title: Node.js API Development
items.description: Build scalable backend APIs with Node.js and Express. Learn RESTful API design, authentication, database integration, and more.

items.title: TypeScript for JavaScript Developers
items.description: Add static typing to your JavaScript with TypeScript. Learn interfaces, generics, type narrowing, and integration with popular frameworks.

items.title: Responsive Web Design
items.description: Create websites that look great on any device. Master media queries, fluid layouts, and mobile-first design principles.

items.title: Advanced React Patterns
items.description: Take your React skills to the expert level. Learn compound components, render props, hooks, context, and performance optimization.
